question: Who is the author of the book "When Crime Pays - Money and Muscle in Indian Politics"?
explanation: The book \"When Crime Pays - Money and Muscle in Indian Politics\" has been authored by Milan Vaishnav. It is the most systematic analysis of corruption and criminalization in Indian politics. The author shows that it is growing because of societal, political, and economic factors. This remarkable book will change readers\' view of democracy in India.
